name: Ophanimon_X
description: Ophanimon X is an Ophan Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody . Its wings shine like crystals, and it is said that your heart will overflow with calm feelings just at first glance. The sight of it standing gently on top of a single wheel also highlights its elegance. The armor on its shoulders detaches and combines together to form a weapon called "EDEN's Lance".
